attributes.action: Make child Maintance service knowledge part of sex education
attributes.additional_details:
CMS is not just a organisation that used to chase dead best parent yet is also used as a weapon and a way to pay punish the other parent. 
CMS also cause issues with contact when a relationship breaks down due to the reserving parent being reluctant for over night night stays because they could loose money if it’s over 52 night pa 
Healthy relationship should be built prior having children to prevent cms being involved 
Hopefully this should make people think before having sex and or a child
attributes.background: CMS is not really talked about until you are involved with the organisation. The government should make it better knowledge of the organisation to the public and make it part of sex education so people are aware this is a organisation that if you have a child you could involved with.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. The PHSE curriculum already includes

"the roles and responsibilities of parents with respect to raising of children, including the characteristics of successful parenting."

https://assets.publishing.service.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/1019542/Relationships_Education__Relationships_and_Sex_Education__RSE__and_Health_Education.pdf

We're not sure how you'd like to be added to the curriculum to include the teaching of the existence of CMS. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do, such as including relationship breakdown in the PHSE curriculum, if you'd like to see that happen.
